prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a mischievous smile and haunting eyes.
I want a Pokemon that specializes in trickery, with dark purple and red colors.
Generate a spooky creature with sharp claws and a shadowy body shape.
Make a Pokemon that embodies stealth and cunning, lurking in urban environments.
Imagine a creature that can blend into shadows and has a playful yet eerie demeanor.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek, amorphous shape that can unexpectedly surprise its foes.
Show me a ghostly Pokemon with an iconic grin and a penchant for scaring trainers.
